links_reviews_title: Cute but should have sized down
links_reviews_text: While I liked the overall style of the shirt it was just too big. I don't think I would have worn the shirt if I wasn't working from home during quarantine, even then I felt frumpy the few times I did wear it. Size down!
This sweatshirt was so soft! It was cute for working from home with jeans and leggings
So, so soft. Just the right amount of bagginess. Super cute. Got tons of zoom, quarantine compliments. Only returning because white clothes don’t last long in my life...
Chic, stylish and comfortable. This sweater is the perfect lightweight work from home sweater. I would size down in this because it does run slightly large.
Oh my goodness, I love this sweatshirt so much! The print is vibrant and the lining is super soft. I ordered my usual size and it is roomy, just like pictured on the model. Wearing this all the time!
These were too small and I couldn’t wear them. The fabrics is a nice, deep indigo.
These ran small for me, so sadly I didn't get to wear them.

I listened to the reviews and ordered a size up. Normally I am a size 0 so I ordered a size 2 BUT I realized after, there was a petite option and that would have been the best fit for me at 5’2”! The straps are a little long as well as the torso section, so the crotch area has some extra fabric, but not enough for anyone else to notice or to stop me from wearing it. I have to say this jumpsuit is super comfortable and once I put it on, I felt put together for a social event and also free enough to do any activity. Great for a long day of wear to take from day to night. The fabric is on the thicker side and has great stretch while maintaining its structured look. If I would have ordered the right size, I definitely would have purchased.

I'm a 6p in pants and a 2p (34A) in tops, so I tried this in 6p and it fit perfectly! The strips accross the front held in my puffy mom tummy, and the wide legs looked great with my bubble booty, so I bought it. It looks great with or without a shirt underneath, so I could wear this to work too!
Wish this would have worked! The fabric is really nice, but it was just way too big everywhere. I normally wear a 0-2, but probably should have ordered a 00p in this.
Me, 36D, and my mother,34a were not able to dip this jumpsuit up over our chest. It was well-made and slightly stretchy, but seem to really run small there.

links_reviews_title: Runs small but soooo cute on those it fits
links_reviews_text: Maybe it’s the cut, so a size up would have been the right play here. I was flying blind with no reviews. My fifteen year old daughter tried it on and it fit her like a glove. She is 5’3” and 117lbs with a lean, athletic body. It was tight in the lower body and certainly tight in the belly on me. I can go between a 2-4 and xs to s. I rely on your reviews to decide. I’m in that peri-menopausal time of my life so my body is just doing whatever it wants. My suggestion would be that you prepare yourself for a fitted jumpsuit with no give. Size up if you have any problem areas you don’t want to accentuate. If you get the right fit, you will absolutely turn heads. This one is a keeper!
Might be good for work because the fabric is like suit material. Runs small.
Very high quality pants. Comfy and perfect for looking cute while casual. Will likely buy these or order them again.
I did all kinds of quarantine activities in these loose fitting joggers. They are soft and not particularly flattering but I don’t think that’s the point.
I’m not a big fan of lounge wear to be worn outside the house but I LOVE these pants. I literally wore then everywhere. I rented them during quarantine so I could be comfy and cute. And I’m convert!
I liked the pants. They were really comfy and looked great with a crop top and sandals. My only complaint is that the crotch was a little low for me, so I had to wear them really high.
These pants run large and long, and looked clownish on me. They are comfortable and the print is cool but hard to pull off if you’re not tall and thin.
wearing them all the time during quarantine, they're so comfy & cute! i love boho pants like these. They fit well and arent awkwardly hanging low like some do

I have a hard time pulling off the Boho look if we're being honest, but these worked for me! They are super comfy and hit in the right places. They're a great jogger pant that adds a little bit of flair with the Boho look, making it feel at least like I have a semblance of dressing up right now.
Loved these jeans. They are the perfect blue. The fit is great for curvy girls who want to wear Agolde or the Levi Wedgie. If you have a slimmer build you may find these oversized.
True to size with a mid-rise fit. They were cropped on me but I'm tall (5'11"). Stretchy and very comfortable

I usually like Paige jeans, so I wasn't surprised that I loved these, but they were even better than I'd hoped for: pockets big enough to hold my phone (reason alone to love them) and they're SO soft and breathable/but the legs are still stiff enough to hold the flare.
I should've sized down as they're a little large once stretched. I'm short so the length is a bit wacky, but they're comfortable and look better than sweatpants.

These pants are so wonderful. Similar in fit and style to Madewell's Emmett Pants and Everlane's Wide Leg pants, but in a muuuuuch nicer fabric/feel. (Which is why they're 3x more expensive, I suppose...) I wish I could keep these. True to size, if a tiny bit big. Just so wonderful.

links_reviews_title: fun powder blue high rise crop
links_reviews_text: fits as expected. High rise. Looks good on tall people. Fun blue for spring/summer. Fake small pockets on the front.
True to size with a very comfortable mid-rise fit. The legs are pleated so they don't squeeze your thighs at the hem which made them really flattering

links_reviews_title: Fit, but is a little tight
links_reviews_text: -very structured but has some give -true crop length -tight in sleeves

links_reviews_title: Fitted, corset style, off the shoulder silhouette
links_reviews_text: - fitted silhouette - adjustable sleeves - denim fabric, with a slight stretch - would wear with a blue denim

links_reviews_title: Great spring crop top, but the sleeves...
links_reviews_text: This crop top was really cute but the sleeves were a bit too much for me, very poofy!
Ohh the yellow was dreamy and so perfect that I almost purchased it. But the fabric is thick, it is a sweater after all. Too much for sunny days. Paired great with white jeans.

links_reviews_title: Her sleeves are so big because they're full of secrets
links_reviews_text: OH I loved this sweater so much. The balloon sleeves are enormous but the cuffs are very elastic, so the sleeves stay up/don't feel too long. The flowers are so pretty, and it's a cheery, cozy, BRIGHT sunshine yellow irl. Get it! You won't regret it.
Love this sweater! Sleeves are long but they are belled so they're supposed to be. Cropped length is great. So soft and cute

links_reviews_title: True to size, sleeves are long
links_reviews_text: True to size with a cropped and boxy fit. The sleeves run very long. They are cinched at the bottom so you can make it work but I think this would be a tricky style for very petite women
Love this Jacket! Sleeves are long but look so cute rolled and pushed up. Love the cropped length and boxy fit
True to size and a very easy fit! It's cut for a cropped and boxy fit. Perfect length to wear with high-waisted jeans without showing too much skin. Snaps down the front with fringe trim
I wasn’t sure at first but once I layered it with leggings and a tee it really gave a complete luxe look! The fabric is amazing!
Wore this all the time. Felt very chic cozy. Goes with whatever it is you're wearing right now.
This piece felt amazing! I wanted to live in it! Pretty muted colors, great fit, length and shoulders all felt perfect. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Would like to live in this.
links_reviews_text: This is amazing. Now I'm obsessed and trying to justify buying it. Perfect for lounging and also amping up a "going out" look I suppose... that's not something I did in this but hopefully will be able to in the future.
Super comfy pants. Fit perfectly. Honestly, may be adding a pair to my closet for good.
Love these jeans! The fabric is really lightweight for summer but didn't wrinkle.
These seemed high quality and cute, but I couldn't even button them so I will not be wearing them. I suggest sizing up at least one size.

links_reviews_title: Runs Small but love the pants!
links_reviews_text: Based on the one other review I thought I'd try going with my usual size. However, once I tried to get them on it felt like I had ordered two sizes too small. I'm going to send these back and size up because otherwise these would be perfect. The linen material feels great and would be perfect for summer, the color is great and I love the tortoiseshell button. If you are considering these and have a pretty straight figure like me (as opposed to an hourglass shape) I'd definitely size up one or two sizes since the waist on these does not have a lot of give/stretch.
These fit in my usual size 27 but they were snug. They are a lightweight fabric though so I imagine they will probably loosen up during the first wear.

I love all Daydreamer clothes, typically the medium fits me great. I'm not sure if this was mislabeled or a mistake because it's practically a dress on me. I can still wear it tucked into jeans, but it's super long and larger than other mediums from Daydreamer.
Loved everything about this shirt. So soft and a perfect tee.
Oversized in a good way
Cool tee shirt runs true to size, but the graphic is crooked. Low quality for the price. Pink tie dye is really pretty and the design would look great under a blazer.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt IF you get the right size!
links_reviews_text: Fantastic, soft, quality fabric and great design, but unfortunately I was SWIMMING in the size small of this shirt! I usually like my t-shirts in medium so they're loose and roomy, but I got this one in small and it was HUGE! The short sleeves almost reached my elbows and the shoulder seams were a full four inches off my shoulders. I wore it around the apartment, but it looked much too oversized to wear outside.
Cute, soft tee. The pink is pretty. It's a pink/white tie-dye. Runs big. Order a size down.

I got a ton of compliments on this shirt! The fit is perfect and material makes it feel more like a classic vintage band tee instead of mass produced (it has a nice weight without being heavy). It drapes nicely tucked into jeans.

links_reviews_title: I basically live in sweatshirts now
links_reviews_text: Nothing magical about it, but it's quarantine and I'm basically living in a sweatsuit. This fit the bill.
My only complaint was the inside could have been softer. Otherwise great crew. I also wouldn’t say it’s oversized in length

This top was very large (ordered a M) and boxy. I actually never wore it because of the fit and how scratchy the sequins were under the arms and along the shirt. It was quite uncomfortable. This was also a piece that I received with tags still on it, therefore, previous wears or washes didn't influence it.
LOVE the details on this shirt but definitely size down. Maybe even two down!
I wanted to love this top but it was way too boxy and felt oversized to me

links_reviews_title: beautifully made but too large for me
links_reviews_text: Love the details on this shirt, but its runs super large! I ordered this before any reviews were up to saw otherwise. I am typically an XS or S in tops and ordered a S, but this S fit like a large. I don't know if an XS would even fit me properly- so unless you want it to be super relaxed/boxy or have a big chest, then i would go down 1 or even 2 sizes if you want it to fit like shown on the model. The shirt is beautiful however (hence the 4 stars) and I do wish the fit was better for me so that I could wear it confidently.

Loved the overall look of this too. It was a little scratchy with with beaded detail but was super effortless - I sized up to ensure fit but should have just bought my regular sizzle (Large) and it would have been more of a perfect fit.

This top is so beautiful with all of embroidered details, but runs super large and boxy. I ordered an XS, but it fits more like a Medium, which would be great for comfort, but the overall fit is unflattering. I tried it on and put it right back in the box, bummed that it runs so large.

links_reviews_title: Pretty top- probably not for the busty
links_reviews_text: This top is pretty and has beading and embellishments that dress it up. I'm busty (32DDD) and it fit my chest, but was large in the waist.
This fit so perfectly! I loved the pattern and it was so comfortable on. A little complicated to put on, but so easy once you get used to it!

I usually love wrap dresses. They are so figure flattering, but this one kind of broke that rule. It had a drop waist seam (weird on a wrap dress) that hit on my hips. The pattern, color, and style were super cute. If you're someone with narrow hips then this dress will still work for you!

links_reviews_title: Cute, Boho dress with a Relaxed Fit
links_reviews_text: The colors on this are very nice--the blue really pops! I like the longer length, sleeves, and wrap-style. It's perfect for a languid summer night. However, like some reviewers said, it DOES sort of look like one of those Asian robes. The fabric is NOT breathable at all, and I was expecting this to be a work-appropriate dress for summer. But if I'm sweating all the time, that's a problem! The price was too high for me to consider keeping it, especially since there were a couple other things in my nuuly that i LOVED, but it was fun to wear a couple of times.

links_reviews_title: Cute but confusing with the liner
links_reviews_text: If I owned it, I’d snip the liner free and that would probably solve my issue.
Loved the style. Almost kept it but not sure I want to remember 2020 forever
Perfect sweatshirt to dress up or down! Very cozy inside but scuba material on the outside. Must have!

so cool. i felt SO COOL. i really wanted someone to see it but alas i just wore it in my room. really easy to spill things on, and the material isn’t what you would expect from the hoodie, but it’s still amazing.

I liked this one, though it's definitely made for style rather than comfort. It's a stiffer, almost neoprene-like fabric that, while it looks dressier and chic, is a little chilly against the skin and doesn't move as well with you as a traditional knit sweatshirt. That said, the color is great for warmer weather, and I was surprised at how it didn't wash me out; it's a good shade of beige, a little cooler than the photo shows. The sporty graphic stripes on the sides give it a streetwear edge. I would have preferred a more oversized fit, so if you want that look then go up a size, as it's cut fairly straight with a tighter band at the bottom. Altogether, I liked this one, and it's great with leggings and sneakers!

I liked the material of this, it was nice and soft. It's more yellow in person than in the photo, and the neck line runs really high so I didn't wear it as much as I thought I would. The model is pulling it down but if your hands aren't in the pockets, the neck line basically goes to your chin. Oversized so size down if you aren't going for that look!
Just female nailed it again! Very nice premium quality fabric. Runs a size large but I loved it for the oversized look.
I prolly should have bought this bc I am so in love with it. I’m stoked that this sweatshirt also helped me discover a new brand JUST FEMALE, which is baller!!
Really stylish and chic but its made out of an almost neoprene type fabric which is pretty stiff so its not very comfortable
Really great quality and texture. Slightly oversized but perfect for a sweatshirt.

I got a medium becuase I like my sweatshirts loose but should have gotten a small because the over sizing was already built into the look. It was comfortable overall but the fabric is a bit stiff. I’m sure that was intentional by the designer but it’s difficult when you can only see it online. It worked.

This is a fun sweatshirt with a cool strip on the sleeve. The material is a bit different then normal sweatshirts----like a light scuba material. It runs full like a hoodie should. If you want fitted then size down otherwise it is true to size for the style. I received mine new with tags.....might be a keeper
This too was really cute but the bust didn’t fit me unfortunately
This top was sooo cute! I wore it a ton under my white overalls and with shorts. It's super comfy too, plus straps are adjustable if you need :)

Really great spring/summer top, very light weight. Hit right around the belly button. I actually ended up styling the tie straps both up and draped down and loved it both ways. The top part is a bit sheer so definitely have a nude bra or covers.

links_reviews_title: True to Size, Chic with High-waisted Denim
links_reviews_text: True to size, cropped length, adjustable straps, ruched body, super lightweight fabric
Loved this dress. Beautiful golden detail, though that detail makes the fabric kinda poky and itchy.
Looked great on model. Had sparkles on material which made it look a lil cheap. Made me look really big
Loved this dress. Beautiful golden detail, though that detail makes the fabric kinda poky and itchy.
Looked great on model. Had sparkles on material which made it look a lil cheap. Made me look really big
I wore these several times - super nice cut - not too flared or tapered. This is my 4th pair of Paige jeans and I love this brand!
These jeans are perfect. They may run a tiny bit big, but just enough to be as comfy as sweats while still flattering, especially in the butt. I wear them almost every day.
Very flattering and comfortable and hit right at the ankle. I could go down a size as they stretch out quite a bit after a days wear.
The fabric is great, so soft! There's a lot of give but will not stretch out. I love the retro vibe they give without committing to a flare. Hits at the ankle.

links_reviews_title: fit as expected for a mid rise
links_reviews_text: -soft and stretchy -hit at ankle -retro vibes
Love this! A fun sweatshirt but dressy so can wear without feeling like a bum. Warmer than expected and great color. Definitely recommend! Want to rent again for cool nights at the beach
I really loved this sweater, it's got a nice heavy ribbed texture but it didn't feel too warm even with spring weather. The low zip made it easy for nursing. Perfect for quarantine days over basics.
Perfect athleisure. Great material.

This was super cute but was way oversized. I ordered a small hoping it would be just big and comfy but it was super long I. The sleeves and the length. Still loved it though! It was incredibly comfortable and perfect for our never ending SIP days!

links_reviews_title: Almost didn't give it a chance!
links_reviews_text: I almost put this back in the box without wearing it. The big gold ring kind of threw me off, I don't love that part but the top as a whole started to grow on me. I wish I would have gotten an XS instead of S because the collar is just huuuge and gives you linebacker shoulders. It might be a little better if sizing down. This is also big enough that sizing down would not be negative for the rest of the fit either. I loved the color too.
Super comfy and cozy!

Absolutely love. I got a compliment on it every time I wore it. It’s a nicer sweatshirt that is acceptable for work zoom calls. Love love loved it. The perfect amount of oversized. I also tucked the bottom of it under my bra to give it the perfect crop! Debating buying.

links_reviews_title: good quality, cozy, just not my ultimate fave
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and felt expensive/is made of nice material. loved the collar and o ring pull. Not in love with the thick band/trim at the bottom and on the sleeves and was a little baggier than i wanted but it was comfy for quarantine.
Loved it, although I would have preferred a more fitted look (and should have gotten the small) / Thick nice quality material. Feels good. Love the fitted hem at wrists.
Don’t like yellow hoop zipper. Not as warm and bulky as it looks on model. Go with your true size, I sized down to small and I wish it was a bit more oversized.
Styled it with the Nuuly strawberry sweater. I liked these jeans, but others around me were confused about the hem. I told them it was supposed to look like that!
Super cute, perfect for spring. Many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Mine didn’t come with a belt
links_reviews_text: But was still a beautiful piece to have during the quarantine! Love the patterns, color and fabric.
This is such a fun and pretty kimono! Fabric is light and a soft silk! Looks beautiful dressed up or down. I’m short and was a little long so wore with heels!
I loved this kimono - so beautiful, so bright, so lovely. I only wish I could have had more opportunities to wear it.
You absolutely must rent this. Its a show stopper! So fun & photographs beautifully!! I would have purchased it if I could afford it.

This gorgeous robe awakened my inner festival goddess. It’s so flowy and beautiful and I can’t help but feel fancy in a high ticket item such as this, that I’d never pay for in real life. It’s a little long for us short folks but the overall fit was more narrow than I was expecting, which I liked. I can think of plenty of artsy places I’d like to go in this beautiful robe if not for quarantine! :(

I wore this around the house all the time - so cute made my day brighter and looked great on all my zoom calls. Lightweight and breezy, good for warmer weather. The silk fabric felt awesome and really lux, a little snug in the shoulders but pretty much fit true to size. I would definitely rent again.

This is a beautifully made, comfortable and luxurious kimono. I wish I was about 6 inches taller so I didn’t feel like a little girl in her moms gown. I wore it for a day over leggings and a tank, which helped spruce up the quarantine wardrobe. Between dragging on the floor and sleeves the size of tents, it was too much for a day indoors chasing kids. Definitely a rent for the tall gals out there!
Pretty, lightweight, silky, gorgeous print -- this was so fun to wear while working from home!
This was so stunning, it made my quarantine outfit of leggings and a t-shirt ALMOST look chic.

This piece is so gorgeous and well made. I wore it a few different ways: over a tie-dye dress in similar colors, over jeans and t-shirt, over PJs, and over a purple knit dress. I think it works best over something simple and plain so that the pattern can steal the show. It's not sheer, but on me it only *just* closed in the front with no overlap. You should size up if you want it to wrap in the front. I'm 5'8" and the length hit me about 3" above my ankle. The colors and patterns are magnificent. Definitely something special.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty but snug hips and staticky
links_reviews_text: Beware if planning to wear as a dress; I wear size 6 pants and this was snug at the hips. Has pockets. It comes with a removable belt, has belt loops. Length was a few inches from the ground at my height. It was very staticky. The sleeves are bell shaped and the bottom half is slightly fluted. Vibrant colors as pictured.
Runs small. Ordered my normal size and it was fine to wear open around the house. Need to size up if you want the top to be comfortable when closed.
i've worn this nearly everyday as a sort of robe, the bright colors really cheer you up when you've been home for 7 weeks :)
Busy print but looks great with jeans and a plain top!

Loved this kimono for quarantine to throw over leggings and a tank. Amazing print and could be worn as a dress for a fun night out. The material is thin, so if planning to wear as a dress a slip would be needed.

This piece is absolutely gorgeous. It’s the first item I am seriously considering purchasing bc it is truly one-of-a-kind. Wonderfully soft, silk fabric. Light weight. Amazing bell sleeves. Wear it over shorts, swimsuit, dress
Absolutely gorgeous and really fun to wear. So pricey but I might buy it. Runs slightly small through the shoulders and chest.
didn’t like the colors of the print in person as much as the photo
The best thing ever, especially during this time. Puts a smile on your face. And can be worn with literally anything! Flares and ruffles and patterns and print. Perfect!

A lot of artistic details in the sleeve and bottom. The fabric is amazing and lightweight. Can wear it over a nice fitted dress or dress it down with jeans. The only thing is it doesn't come together in the front to overlap the fabric. Otherwise, it fit as expected!
-fits true to size with open fit -silky and lightweight -very summer like
I loved this top! Didn't want to send back. It was a perfect fit even though I am larger chested.

Okay...when I first tried these on I was thinking there was no way I’d be able to break these in...I could barely get them over my booty at first and buttoning them was even more of a challenge. BUT I’m so glad I went through a little discomfort to stretch them because they ended being amazing!!! The more I wore them the better they got! I received so many compliments on them too because they are so unique and fun! Would highly recommend...maybe size up or just prepare to stretch them out and endure some discomfort at first.

links_reviews_title: When you finally get comfortable with a denim brand...
links_reviews_text: I own 3 pairs of Rollas denim, all different styles, all size 25. Naturally, I ordered a size 25 in these but I COULD NOT get them over my hips/butt. I managed to wiggle my ass into them (it was a full cardio workout) but it was pointless as they were far too small to zip & button over my waist. There is zero stretch in the denim, which I don’t mind, but it did not help my plight. For the record, if you had to choose between “boyish” and “curvy” to describe my hips and butt, you would definitely choose the former. The sizing just seems off in comparison to Rollas’ other options.
Love these pants so much. If you are between sizes, I would definitely go up as the pants are true to size but maybe a little small in the waist.

links_reviews_title: Too Small then too large kinda denim
links_reviews_text: I really love the look and overall quality of these jeans. When I first tried them on, I thought I was going to break them and decided to re-wear my sweatpants! Then I attempted to put them on again and found that while they were tight on my hips, they were too big on my waist, so there were gaps. After a few wears, they are now v stretched and baggy. So thats annoying.

I was unfamiliar with this brand but took a chance. I actually “sized up” thinking that would be a good idea - wow was I wrong / I thin these are 4 sizes off. Love the style but such a terrible miss on the sizing and fit.
I love these pants! I have a bit of a bigger booty and small waist and I can never find items that work for me. These fit perfectly and are a nice off white which goes with a lot!
I liked these pants, but they were a little short - and im 5'4 so I don't say this about many pants!
Could not even get these up over my hips. Ever other item I’ve ordered in a 28 has fit.

links_reviews_title: Loved these so much I bought them
links_reviews_text: Just bought these and couldn’t believe they had negative reviews! I’m a 26 with slim hips but a fairly big booty (my waist/hip is 26/36) & these fit like a dream, they actually ended up being my first nuuly purchase. They’re comfortable and I’ve gotten so many compliments on them!
Super cute but running at least two sizes small. I’m typically a 25 and I would probably need a 27 or 28 to get them zipped.

Super bummed, these were the item I was most looking forward to this month and was planning on buying, but they are extremely small. I am normally a 29/30 in all stores, and these couldn't go up beyond my hips. Not sure if there was something off from the sizing since they are from an Aussie brand, but if so, I wish that was explained in the description of the item.

Okay...when I first tried these on I was thinking there was no way I’d be able to break these in...I could barely get them over my booty at first and buttoning them was even more of a challenge. BUT I’m so glad I went through a little discomfort to stretch them because they ended being amazing!!! The more I wore them the better they got! I received so many compliments on them too because they are so unique and fun! Would highly recommend...maybe size up or just prepare to stretch them out and endure some discomfort at first.

links_reviews_title: When you finally get comfortable with a denim brand...
links_reviews_text: I own 3 pairs of Rollas denim, all different styles, all size 25. Naturally, I ordered a size 25 in these but I COULD NOT get them over my hips/butt. I managed to wiggle my ass into them (it was a full cardio workout) but it was pointless as they were far too small to zip & button over my waist. There is zero stretch in the denim, which I don’t mind, but it did not help my plight. For the record, if you had to choose between “boyish” and “curvy” to describe my hips and butt, you would definitely choose the former. The sizing just seems off in comparison to Rollas’ other options.
Love these pants so much. If you are between sizes, I would definitely go up as the pants are true to size but maybe a little small in the waist.

links_reviews_text: I really love the look and overall quality of these jeans. When I first tried them on, I thought I was going to break them and decided to re-wear my sweatpants! Then I attempted to put them on again and found that while they were tight on my hips, they were too big on my waist, so there were gaps. After a few wears, they are now v stretched and baggy. So thats annoying.

I was unfamiliar with this brand but took a chance. I actually “sized up” thinking that would be a good idea - wow was I wrong / I thin these are 4 sizes off. Love the style but such a terrible miss on the sizing and fit.
I love these pants! I have a bit of a bigger booty and small waist and I can never find items that work for me. These fit perfectly and are a nice off white which goes with a lot!
I liked these pants, but they were a little short - and im 5'4 so I don't say this about many pants!
Could not even get these up over my hips. Ever other item I’ve ordered in a 28 has fit.

links_reviews_title: Loved these so much I bought them
links_reviews_text: Just bought these and couldn’t believe they had negative reviews! I’m a 26 with slim hips but a fairly big booty (my waist/hip is 26/36) & these fit like a dream, they actually ended up being my first nuuly purchase. They’re comfortable and I’ve gotten so many compliments on them!
Super cute but running at least two sizes small. I’m typically a 25 and I would probably need a 27 or 28 to get them zipped.

Super bummed, these were the item I was most looking forward to this month and was planning on buying, but they are extremely small. I am normally a 29/30 in all stores, and these couldn't go up beyond my hips. Not sure if there was something off from the sizing since they are from an Aussie brand, but if so, I wish that was explained in the description of the item.
Cute print but kind of a rough fabric. It is a sweet flowy summer dress
Cute, comfy, classic tee. I liked it so much I ended up buying it.

Really cute design and super comfy and soft. I ordered an XL because I like loose fitting shirts and rolling up the sleeves (usually a medium), but I think even a large would have worked. Super versatile, wore it with skirts and jeans
This was a super cute shirt just to throw on and go. The brand has a cool story behind it to which I really liked. The graphics were soft and not stiff too which I appreciated.
So cute and comfy!

I really liked this t-shirt. It's very cute with shorts and jeans. I am an 8-10 in tops (M or L) and I rented the L, so it was just slightly larger than true fit. If you want it fitted, I would rent your usual size. Really love the shirt.
Normally a medium, but like my graphic tees to be a little loose. This fit perfectly and received quite a few compliments. I didn't feel it was too boxy. Looked cute with rolled sleeves too.

links_reviews_title: Cute and good for plant lovers
links_reviews_text: I liked this but wish I would have gotten a large for a bit more relaxed fit. In any case its cute and I wore it several times.
I got multiple compliments on this shirt!
Love me a good oversized shirt. I got a large to get that look and it didn’t disappoint. I wore it tucked into black jeans usually

It's a very boxy shirt. It was tight in the chest and loose everywhere else. It doesn't fit like a normal tee shirt. I had to roll up the sleeves a few times to make it look nice. It was too long for a crop but too short for a normal tee length so I tied it up in a knot when I wore it. I was planning on buying it but the fit was so awkward that I decided not to.

Tshirt is super cute! You can't tell the way the model has styled it, but it is fairly boxy. I wear it tucked in, so it didn't matter to me anyways. I'll probably buy this one because it's at a great price point. Easy for layering and love throwing it on to look a little cuter during quarantine.
I love this top so much! It’s a great graphic tee to have.
I love this shirt! So happy that Nuuly is carrying cute National Parks merch. This shirt is a perfect staple with a little umph. :) Most likely going to purchase, because it's just so easy to wear!
It is a bit boxy, but still wanted enough that I purchased!
I loved this so much that I bought it. The perfect mix between a cool and comfy tee. Fits true to size but a tad loose due to the casual-ness of it.
Super cute graphic. It is on the smaller side, so if youre in between sizes, I'd size up.
Float and magical
It wears just like it looks
Very well made dress. Quite a bit of cleavage. Was hard to zip. Beautiful dress
Very bright yellow top. Runs a little large/oversized. Boyfriend cut kinda shirt. I should have sized down.
I love this shirt, it was cute as is or tied up. The shirt is boxy and I would suggest ordering a size down if you want a more fitted look.
Super light and airy. Perfect for lots of different outfits!
I decided to tie this in the front to give it a more fun look! You could also wear it as is or unbuttoned with a top under! True to size. Can be wrinkly if not hung up.
I liked the jacket overall! It's a nice light-weight material and definitely made to be boxy, which I found good for layering.

Lightweight and soft. The material is silky like that of a slip, but it's thin so seamless undergarments would work best with this one. Bonus that the straps are adjustable! Tall girls beware though - this runs on the short side.
Love this tank. Breezy and flowy with a soft cotton feel. The plunge neck detail provides plenty of coverage but is still subtly sexy. The straps tie in the back and are adjustable!
Love this tank. Breezy and flowy with a soft cotton feel. The plunge neck detail provides plenty of coverage but is still subtly sexy. The straps tie in the back and are adjustable!

I loved this top! I normally don't fit well in bustier-inspired chest tops like this, but I was really impressed and really surprised that the fit was so wonderful. The big puff sleeves are so fun; the elastic on the cuff is great if you want the sleeve to be shorter. Feels super well made and the raw seaming detail is everything!

Cute top, lightweight and true to size. Perfect for the warmer weather months! Slightly boxy. The bottom is an elastic bubble hem, which means you won't be able to tuck this style and it rides up a bit as you move - be aware of some crop. The cut-outs lay in the perfect place so you can go with or without a bra.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but not for everyone
links_reviews_text: Elastic waist and hard to wear a bra with but it was cute and I think there are people here who’d love it! It’s def on trend and would be a great summer piece for someone who’s mastered the art of undergarments and maybe not 50 years old :)

Very cute detailing but I didn't realize it had an elastic hem or wouldn't have selected it. It's very short although I am long waisted but it was really awkward overall and rode up as soon as I lifted my arms any amount.

Cute top, lightweight and true to size. Perfect for the warmer weather months! Slightly boxy. The bottom is an elastic bubble hem, which means you won't be able to tuck this style and it rides up a bit as you move - be aware of some crop. The cut-outs lay in the perfect place so you can go with or without a bra.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but not for everyone
links_reviews_text: Elastic waist and hard to wear a bra with but it was cute and I think there are people here who’d love it! It’s def on trend and would be a great summer piece for someone who’s mastered the art of undergarments and maybe not 50 years old :)

Very cute detailing but I didn't realize it had an elastic hem or wouldn't have selected it. It's very short although I am long waisted but it was really awkward overall and rode up as soon as I lifted my arms any amount.
This is nice. Though I agree it isn’t the most flattering thing in the world. I found a way to convert it into a skirt by putting a tip over it and it looked cute that way ❤️
Runs small. Too tight at chest and I have a very small chest.

Dress is so cute and has really good detail. Fabric is soft, yet thick and secure. Absolutely loves this dress and the length. Knocked a star down because it is not the most flattering. The skirt portion is a little fluffy, which made me look a little bigger.
This is nice. Though I agree it isn’t the most flattering thing in the world. I found a way to convert it into a skirt by putting a tip over it and it looked cute that way ❤️
Runs small. Too tight at chest and I have a very small chest.

Dress is so cute and has really good detail. Fabric is soft, yet thick and secure. Absolutely loves this dress and the length. Knocked a star down because it is not the most flattering. The skirt portion is a little fluffy, which made me look a little bigger.

THIS TOP IS SO BEAUTIFUL. I didn't realize there was a matching skirt and I will 100 percent be renting both in the future. Did I get to wear this? No. Did I have a reason to rent in given we are in a quarantine situation? Absolutely not. BUT I DID IT ANYWAY and I'm glad I did because once the stay at home order is lifted I will be renting this to SERVE at a local establishment. Or maybe just my living room, who knows.
Definitely cropped but not too much. The sleeves are the right length and have beautiful embroidery on them. A great statement top.
True to size with a boxy and cropped fit

links_reviews_title: Cute, but go with your true size
links_reviews_text: I read reviews on this blouse that said it ran tight in the bust. Maybe I'm not as busty as I thought I was, but I'm normally a small and went with a medium which ended up being far too large in the shoulders and bust. There are shoulder pads in this shirt which would be sooo cute if it fit, but in a size too large I felt like a dainty football player. My fiancee really liked it though even though it was a little big - it does have a really flattering cut that highlights your waist so maybe I'd try it again in a smaller size!

links_reviews_title: Cute online; awkward fit in person
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this and ordered it for a flirty feminine option with my box, but sadly the fit was awkward. The tapered waist is cute but the bust area is too gappy, which looked sloppy with the padded shoulders and mid arm length of sleeves.
never wore it, way too small. size up 2 sizes

links_reviews_title: Black cute top with small shoulder pads
links_reviews_text: Cute for work! It would be cute tucked into a skirt. It was a little tight and pulling at the buttons. I would recommend sizing up. There are small shoulder pads.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous sexy and demure at same time
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Wore with black jeans and rose jeans. Dr seed up with black slacks.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and cozy, but very very large
links_reviews_text: I took everyone’s advice and sized down but this sweater was still enormous. I loved the mixed fabric and it was really cozy and stylish so I still wore it because you couldn’t tell how big it was on my Zoom calls, which was perfect!
Love this cardigan. I wore it button up as a shirt. Great with jeans obviously but also leggings

I styled this so many ways with WFH status. It was perfect for a chilly office at home, with a pair of loose shorts, or a pair of nice tights. If I didn’t want to worry about cleavage I would wear a no wire bralette under.
Love this easy to wear cardigan! In style for years!
This was a really great top. The sweater shirt combo was so comfortable
I wanted to like this, but it just looks funny. Couldn't even wear it out.
The “mixed” cardigan is part named. I loved, loved this piece and probably should have purchased it. Ideally suited for the office or dressed down on the weekend.

I loved this cardigan so much, I decided to keep it. It is perfect if you need to wear corporate attire to work. I love that the back is longer than the front. It look great buttoned up and open with all black or all white underneath. Love it!
Loved this it was super cute and perfect for out or the office.
Loved the classic look of this sweater with a fun twist. Didn’t purchase but may rent again to do so!

I will buy this. This is one of those piece of clothing that seems unassuming but you find yourself reaching for it over and over. The fabric part of it is so substantial and just your typical cotton poplin--almost like a linen--but not quite. Order a size down and you'll probably buy it too.
Loved this sweater and got so many compliments! I always wore it as a sweater (never unbuttoned). The contrast of shirt material and sweater was very unique. Highly recommend.
I loved wearing this to work. Comfortable and cute.
This is a great top, wore to work, dinner, just a really solid style and fit.
This sweater is a fantastic combo look, wish I had listened to the reviews and sized down.
Love this. Comfy and cute a great look for work. Fabric was light and soft.
This sweater is good for work. There was something slightly off about it, but I still wore it and liked it. It is longer in length in the back so it was cute with leather leggings.
Got so many compliments at work. The fit was very comfortable and flattering. I’m going to buy it!

I can't really tell if I liked this one or not. Very comfortable - the sweater part was super soft. I rolled up the sleeves and liked it better that way - but it was so bulky and wide that I had a hard time getting it to lay properly when I tucked just the front. But untucked it looked way to frumpy. It was - just ok - I won't rent it again, but i'm not sorry I did.

I loved the mix of cardigan and woven shirt, and the tail at the back. The back length made it perfect for leggings. This also seemed really well made, soft cardigan fabric, and very structured woven shirt gave it a nice drape.
I rented this after my daughter had it the month before - and we both loved it so much we will probably buy it. Great with a white t shirt and jeans!!! Good all year round.
I wanted to love this, but the billowy shape just didn't work for my body type. It's super cute and I love the mixed materials. Sadly, I didn't wear it.

This cardigan took me back in time....to when I was 5 and liked to play dress up with my parents clothes. Seriously, I was swimming in this sweater. It was ridiculous. This medium should have even an XXXL.
Oversized, comfy style. Classy enough for work or relaxed enough for play.
Loved this sweater! So original, cute and perfect in all occasion (work, night out, brunch...)
it's a unique design. made me look small in waist. different materials in front and back is nice. the silhouette is much looser than I expected.

Its a cardigan, its a blouse, its both (but not in a boring way!) This is truly a fun way to mix up two office staples and feel like you are having a bit of fun. It fits loose so also great for a winter workday when you would rather be home in your sweats (or is that everyday?) Also easy to dress down for the weekend for a casual polished look.
It ran a little oversized, but I think it is supposed to. It is a cool sweater that I wore dressed up and down. The "mixed media" makes it remarkable.
This top is so cute and adds some interest to the jeans & sweater combo. I got so many compliments and decided the buy price was well worth it as I plan to wear this top many more times.

I loved wearing this to work. Comfortable and cute.
This is a great top, wore to work, dinner, just a really solid style and fit.
This sweater is a fantastic combo look, wish I had listened to the reviews and sized down.
Love this. Comfy and cute a great look for work. Fabric was light and soft.
This sweater is good for work. There was something slightly off about it, but I still wore it and liked it. It is longer in length in the back so it was cute with leather leggings.
Got so many compliments at work. The fit was very comfortable and flattering. I’m going to buy it!

it's a unique design. made me look small in waist. different materials in front and back is nice. the silhouette is much looser than I expected.

It fits loose so also great for a winter workday when you would rather be home in your sweats (or is that everyday?) Also easy to dress down for the weekend for a casual polished look.
It ran a little oversized, but I think it is supposed to. It is a cool sweater that I wore dressed up and down. The "mixed media" makes it remarkable.
This top is so cute and adds some interest to the jeans & sweater combo. I got so many compliments and decided the buy price was well worth it as I plan to wear this top many more times.
This cardigan is the best! The knit has a nice weight to it and super cozy.

This was cute but very cropped! Probably would have been cuter with jeans rather than the all-leggings wardrobe I'm currently wearing. But it's a nice thick knit, nice weight without being too heavy, versatile color.
Pretty color, great sleeves.
Great neutral color to later with loungewear and perfect for staying at home!
Loved the color, style, And quality of this blouse, but I thought it was too short at the waist for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and light, perfect for summer!
links_reviews_text: Loved this shirt!!! Wore it at least 1-2 times a week. It was so easy to throw on with some jeans and look professional for my work calls.
What a beautiful, flattering top -- the kind that makes you feel pretty and put together when you absolutely do not. I may just buy it!
It’s cool and comfortable for the summer. Great for dressing up and down!
Loved the color, style, And quality of this blouse, but I thought it was too short at the waist for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and light, perfect for summer!
links_reviews_text: Loved this shirt!!! Wore it at least 1-2 times a week. It was so easy to throw on with some jeans and look professional for my work calls.
What a beautiful, flattering top -- the kind that makes you feel pretty and put together when you absolutely do not. I may just buy it!
It’s cool and comfortable for the summer. Great for dressing up and down!
This jacket can be dressed up or down. I chose to wear it with a graphic tee and jeans.

I lift so I have broad shoulders and therefore sized up as I usually do with blazers. The shoulders hit right but the sleeves were too long and the rest of the jacket was too baggy. Also the material looks somewhat silky in the picture but it is more matte and textured in real life. Very pretty though - may rent again in a small.

I think I would have loved this if the fit would have worked! It seems well made and the print is beautiful, but the tunic was just too tight in the bust for me. I will be trying this in the next size!
Cute dress. Not much shape to it, but was lightweight and comfy
The dress looks beautiful on the hanger but once on it’s see through and looks too frumpy. Really baggy especially in the bust.
Love the look and feel on the hanger! Maybe it’s my body type...kind of frumped me out a bit
Beautiful dress but it’s still not warm enough to wear during quarantine! Will rent again for summer when it’s hot outside!

links_reviews_title: So cute! But unlined and see-through.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flowy and a perfect weight for a hot summer day, but it is not lined so you can see right through the lower half (*especially when the sun hits it). The top isn't as see-through because of the double-layer, but it has a swiss dot texture so it's uncomfortable and scratchy if you don't wear a bra. Too many work-arounds needed to wear this dress for me.

This dress is just gorgeous. The straps are adjustable so you can wear it where you like. The material is a floaty sort of cottony material, it’s very soft. There is an embroidery in the material which is slightly scratchy so I had to wear a bra with it. It looked lovely on though so totally worth it.

links_reviews_title: love the style and pattern but way too big
links_reviews_text: I am always a large in rompers, so i got a large in this lil cutey. WAY TOO BIG. Size down friends.
It’s so large, I could have ordered 2 sizes smaller and it still would have been a baggy fit
This looks really good on the model but not irl. The waist is every baggy and gave me an egg like shape. Would not recommend.
funky fit and the crotch hung down really low 😕 cute in the photo but idk who it would fit body style wise
wayyy to big would be cute with a belt

I really wanted to love this. I knew it would be oversized and cropped but did not realize how open and deep the neckline would be. Because of this, it looks like I am wearing the wrong size top versus a purposeful oversized boxy/ flowy fit. I recommend wearing this with something high waisted. It may look good with a lace bralet underneath. Just know that when you sit down the V on the neckline May dip below your bra band.

I love this top! It is light, flowy, and comfortable. The color is perfect for spring and will work all the way through fall. The v-neck is a little low for my taste but it is an easy fix - I put a pink tank under. I wore it with boyfriend jeans and camel color sandals. I got a couple of compliments and maybe some new Nuuly subscribers. I think I will buy this one!

This top was kind of boxy as the other reviews mentioned. I liked it as a casual throw & go. I have long hair, but for me the breeziness of the v-cut back was awkward and annoying. I ended up wearing it backward. Cute, but not super exciting. I think I could have sized down to reduce the boxiness, too.
I really love the idea of this top, but I didn't love it on-- it was just "okay". Kind of short and boxy, but awkward to front tuck because it doesn't drape well.
Boxy fit- just wasn’t flattering on me.
Really love this skirt. I feel like I could style it in so many ways. Also it is elastic waistband so nice and comfortable. It was long on me, closer to maxi but still looked cute.

Cute pants. I am on the short side with a short torso...these definitely fit me a bit differently than they did on the model. Waist was a tad long and the leg hit just below my ankle. Which is nothing new for me but I will probably size down and rent them again. I paired with a plain white T and cropped black cardi. Got a bunch of compliments!
Loved these pants! Fit like a glove with a little stretch. They do wrinkle easily.

They were fine. I was excited for them because I love mustard/golden shades and liked the cut of the pants. However the fabric is a thinner material and would be great for summer but not substantial enough for year-round wear. The color is more like pea soup green/yellow. Think ripe avocado. It was terrible with my olive skin tone. Fit as expected. Bagged out slightly after wearing all day.

Love the super fun color and the fit was almost perfect. Maybe a little long in the rise and I am very long waisted so might not be good if you're not. The fabric is super stretchy and comfy. Definitely a keeper.

Absolutely loved this top. It's such a fun color and very soft fabric. The only reason I didn't buy it was because it doesn't stay in place all the time, I think because of the fabric it's made out of. Highly recommend for a fun top.
This is the softest top I have ever had the pleasure of wearing. The color is vibrant but not blinding and fit is sweeeet. Couldn't recommend it more.

Loved the idea of these jeans, super cute buckle details for a western flare! Unfortunately they had a bit of a weird fit for my body type. The waist was a bit big and gaping while the calf and ankle of the jeans were extremely tight. Just didn’t work for me.

These pants are bomb for my Body type. The buckle details are super cute. Very high rise but still comfortable. very little stretch. Great wash. For me, jeans are usually tightest in the waist and loose in the butt and legs, but these pants are snug in the thighs.

I liked these a lot, they were new when I ordered them and based on reviews from other jeans from this brand I sized up. I wish I had ordered a 27 or 28. Since they were a bit loose in the waist I only wore them a couple of times

i fell in love with these when i saw them but they were way too big!! i have about a 25” waist but a bigger butt so i usually have to size up in pants. they fit fine around my butt, but were really big on my waist (and i can’t wear a belt because of the little belt detailing on the side) and on my thighs which i’ve never had an issue with in other jeans. felt like great quality and are SUPER CUTE, unfortunately wasn't a hit for me.

This just wasn’t flattering on me. Had the straps been adjustable I would have been able to have the neckline lower and it would have looked a lot better. I also didn’t really like material it was too synthetic feeling. The pattern was pretty and the style of the skirt was very pretty.
These work well if you’re looking for a good, basic straight leg blue jean. They’re not dramatically high waisted, not too form-fitting. Definitely great quality.
Perfect fit and length. So comfortable. Love everything about them. Couldn’t send them back!
These jeans looked a bit less slim on me than pictured, but I am short. A good basic dad jean but not as cropped as I’d like, had to cuff.
I love these! Ended up purchasing.
Generally wear a 32 comfortably in Levis - these run small. Too bad because weight of denim and color are spot on!
Very cute jeans but after reading the comments I upsized and would definitely recommend doing that. The jeans fit my butt+thighs but was too big in the waist! Not meant for curvy or muscly thighs!
Wore these all the time. Made my butt look nice and went with everything. Fun with booties and heels.
These are just so comfortable and go with everything. I love Levis. These have the perfect rise and a little stretch. They maybe run just a touch big.
Amazing jeans. Only thing was the ankles were more flared in person than in the photo. Could've sized down - they do have stretch - but they were comfy and I wore them a million times.

links_reviews_title: Love thess jeans, but need a bigger size.
links_reviews_text: I got these in a size 27 but they were too tight. Getting these again but sizing up. But overall, these jeans were so cute and comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jeans! (unexpected button closure - no zipper)
links_reviews_text: Perfect Jeans! Unexpected button closure - no zipper. But they fit great and are flattering.
For 5'3/5'4ish height these hit at the perfect length to pair with ankle booties for that effortless look!
A pair of jeans that actually feels cozy! These were so cute.
Fits nice and high with room for butt and thighs. I’m hourglass so this is a perfect fit for those people like me. Nice and stiff that holds in some areas but does not flatten your butt out.

I loved how these fit! as a petite gal who is 4’11 I thought “okay these cropped jeans will fit me like normal jeans” but i still hasn’t to cuff them at the ankles to get the length i wanted!!! anyway they were very cute and made my butt look amazing!
Loved these and wore them dressed up and down. Only complaint is they are very hard to button up. Considering buying or renting again down the line.
Loved these. Super stretchy and comfortable.
True to size, rigid denim, fun wash, hits above ankle, high/mid rise, mom jeans vibe
These jeans were super comfy and looked great paired with oversized sweaters and low top sneakers.
order a size smaller, will stretch and fit perfectly. so comfy, could dress up or down. own in black and now these!
The high waist takes some wear to get to the perfect fit. I have worn these a few times and they have molded to perfection! The jeans are thick cotton and not stretchy.
These were perfect. There's something about a good pair of 501's that just fit like a glove. They go with everything!
Runs small, size up 1 or 2 sizes for curves, very rigid
These work well if you’re looking for a good, basic straight leg blue jean. They’re not dramatically high waisted, not too form-fitting. Definitely great quality.
Perfect fit and length. So comfortable. Love everything about them. Couldn’t send them back!
These jeans looked a bit less slim on me than pictured, but I am short. A good basic dad jean but not as cropped as I’d like, had to cuff.
I love these! Ended up purchasing.
Generally wear a 32 comfortably in Levis - these run small. Too bad because weight of denim and color are spot on!
Very cute jeans but after reading the comments I upsized and would definitely recommend doing that. The jeans fit my butt+thighs but was too big in the waist! Not meant for curvy or muscly thighs!
Wore these all the time. Made my butt look nice and went with everything. Fun with booties and heels.
These are just so comfortable and go with everything. I love Levis. These have the perfect rise and a little stretch. They maybe run just a touch big.
Amazing jeans. Only thing was the ankles were more flared in person than in the photo. Could've sized down - they do have stretch - but they were comfy and I wore them a million times.

links_reviews_title: Love thess jeans, but need a bigger size.
links_reviews_text: I got these in a size 27 but they were too tight. Getting these again but sizing up. But overall, these jeans were so cute and comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jeans! (unexpected button closure - no zipper)
links_reviews_text: Perfect Jeans! Unexpected button closure - no zipper. But they fit great and are flattering.
For 5'3/5'4ish height these hit at the perfect length to pair with ankle booties for that effortless look!
A pair of jeans that actually feels cozy! These were so cute.
Fits nice and high with room for butt and thighs. I’m hourglass so this is a perfect fit for those people like me. Nice and stiff that holds in some areas but does not flatten your butt out.

I loved how these fit! as a petite gal who is 4’11 I thought “okay these cropped jeans will fit me like normal jeans” but i still hasn’t to cuff them at the ankles to get the length i wanted!!! anyway they were very cute and made my butt look amazing!
Loved these and wore them dressed up and down. Only complaint is they are very hard to button up. Considering buying or renting again down the line.
Loved these. Super stretchy and comfortable.
True to size, rigid denim, fun wash, hits above ankle, high/mid rise, mom jeans vibe
These jeans were super comfy and looked great paired with oversized sweaters and low top sneakers.
order a size smaller, will stretch and fit perfectly. so comfy, could dress up or down. own in black and now these!
The high waist takes some wear to get to the perfect fit. I have worn these a few times and they have molded to perfection! The jeans are thick cotton and not stretchy.
These were perfect. There's something about a good pair of 501's that just fit like a glove. They go with everything!
Runs small, size up 1 or 2 sizes for curves, very rigid
These work well if you’re looking for a good, basic straight leg blue jean. They’re not dramatically high waisted, not too form-fitting. Definitely great quality.
Perfect fit and length. So comfortable. Love everything about them. Couldn’t send them back!
These jeans looked a bit less slim on me than pictured, but I am short. A good basic dad jean but not as cropped as I’d like, had to cuff.
I love these! Ended up purchasing.
Generally wear a 32 comfortably in Levis - these run small. Too bad because weight of denim and color are spot on!
Very cute jeans but after reading the comments I upsized and would definitely recommend doing that. The jeans fit my butt+thighs but was too big in the waist! Not meant for curvy or muscly thighs!
Wore these all the time. Made my butt look nice and went with everything. Fun with booties and heels.
These are just so comfortable and go with everything. I love Levis. These have the perfect rise and a little stretch. They maybe run just a touch big.
Amazing jeans. Only thing was the ankles were more flared in person than in the photo. Could've sized down - they do have stretch - but they were comfy and I wore them a million times.

links_reviews_title: Love thess jeans, but need a bigger size.
links_reviews_text: I got these in a size 27 but they were too tight. Getting these again but sizing up. But overall, these jeans were so cute and comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jeans! (unexpected button closure - no zipper)
links_reviews_text: Perfect Jeans! Unexpected button closure - no zipper. But they fit great and are flattering.
For 5'3/5'4ish height these hit at the perfect length to pair with ankle booties for that effortless look!
A pair of jeans that actually feels cozy! These were so cute.
Fits nice and high with room for butt and thighs. I’m hourglass so this is a perfect fit for those people like me. Nice and stiff that holds in some areas but does not flatten your butt out.

I loved how these fit! as a petite gal who is 4’11 I thought “okay these cropped jeans will fit me like normal jeans” but i still hasn’t to cuff them at the ankles to get the length i wanted!!! anyway they were very cute and made my butt look amazing!
Loved these and wore them dressed up and down. Only complaint is they are very hard to button up. Considering buying or renting again down the line.
Loved these. Super stretchy and comfortable.

This is such a fun piece! The color palette is so dreamy and the tie dye look is very on trend. The fringe makes it super fun. Came new with tags and It’s a keeper! Love it!

I live in LA and it has been really hot but I had to purchase this to wear when it cools down because it is awesome. The material is not worth the retail price but is worth the nuuly price. The fit and colors are awesome. I do wish the fringe was double sided and not plain on the back. Overall this is completely adorable.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Jacket fit true to size. Color and tassles are amazing! Can't wait to wear this to a concert : )
Omg I love this jacket sooo much. I’m thinking of buying it! The cut is perfect, true to size, so cute and vibrant but surprisingly versatile.
